Description.Text: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Bloomsbury, Cheshire Hotel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. 24-hour room service, Wi-Fi in public areas, room service, coffee shop, elevator are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Non smoking rooms, heating, desk, telephone, internet access â€“ wireless (charges apply) can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Cheshire Hotel combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in London unforgettable.
